title: Interpretation of a dream about a needle by Ibn Sirin and major translators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a needle: Dreaming about a needle in a dream is one of the dreams that many people wonder about and do not know whether the interpretation of this vision is positive or negative, because it varies depending on the location of the needle, but it is basically a sign that the dreamer was going through some financial crises, so you should follow this article To know many other interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a needle When the dreamer sees a needle in a dream, this may be a sign that he will repent for all sins and start a new life without mistakes. Seeing a needle in a dream can be a sign of resolving crises and getting rid of them, and when the needle is intact then Broken in a dream, it symbolizes the many pressures that the dreamer faces. Whoever dreams of a sewing needle entering his hand, this means that there are some vibrations that the dreamer will be exposed to in the coming period. The presence of a fallen needle on the ground in the workplace, this indicates separation from this job and moving to... Another new post. Interpretation of a dream about a needle by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that if the dreamer is poor or going through a financial crisis and sees that he is sewing clothes with a needle, this symbolizes a change in economic conditions and an increase in livelihood and wealth after poverty and earning a lot of money. A needle in a dream can indicate To a new beginning or an end to worries and a new beginning in something else in which the dreamer achieves some success. When a person in a dream sees a medical needle in front of him, this is a sign that the person is close to recovering from a disease that almost destroyed his body. As for the girl who sees a needle in the veil in a dream, this A sign of her purity, chastity, and love for God Almighty. A needle in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is using a needle for things that could harm him or using it incorrectly, this is an indication that he will hear bad news that will cause him despair and disappointment. As for seeing the needle intact and not... Dirty, this is a sign of goodness, abundance of money, and increased blessing in the diet. When the dreamer sees in a dream a sewing needle, this is a sign of the return of the relationship between friends and the completion of reconciliation between them again, and this is after years of separation. As for the medical needle in the dream, this symbolizes Achieving the goals that the dreamer has striven for for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a needle for a single woman: A needle in a girl’s dream may indicate that she will communicate with a good man who will satisfy her heart soon. If a single woman is a student in a school or university and sees a medical needle in a dream, this symbolizes her success and excellence. In the study. When a girl sees a needle and thread in a dream, this leads to solving problems and getting rid of fears that this girl has recently suffered from. A dream about a needle for one person can be a sign of the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of higher positions. If a girl sees that a man gave her a needle or an injection In a dream, this is a sign that he will propose to her in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about a needle in the hand for a single woman: When a girl sees that a needle is in her right hand, this means that she repents to God and approaches the path of goodness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scene in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: seeing a tent in a dream, seeing a tent in the desert, a colored tent, a dream of breaking a tent, a dream of seeing a white tent, a dream of a black tent, interpretation of seeing a tent for a single pregnant woman who is married, and the interpretation of this vision is completely different for a man, whether he is married or not. We explain all the interpretations in This article.Interpretation of seeing a tent by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of dreaming of a scene in a dream is evidence of the great position that the dreamer has achieved. Seeing a scene in a dream also indicates good appearance. Interpretation of a merchant seeing a scene in a dream, as Ibn Sirin interpreted it as a sign of travel and wandering. Interpretation of a vision Al-Nabulsi for the scene: Al-Nabulsi confirmed that seeing a scene in a dream indicates a woman or a grave. The interpretation of seeing a large number of scenes in a dream is evidence of Hajj and pilgrims. The interpretation of seeing a scene in the mountains in a dream indicates marriage and sometimes a sign of death. Interpretation of seeing a tent by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing the establishment of a stage in a dream indicates the position that the viewer receives and a lot of money. The interpretation of seeing a stage in a merchant’s dream indicates traveling to obtain money. Ibn Shaheen confirmed that seeing a broken tent indicates the dreamer’s problems and troubles. Seeing an old scene in a dream means sadness and anxiety for the pioneer. Interpretation of a vision of a tent for an unmarried woman: Seeing the scene in a girl’s dream shows the security she feels. Interpretation of a dream of a tent falling or breaking in a dream is evidence of unfortunate events. Seeing a dream of tents being demolished by winds and storms is evidence of wars and conflicts that she is waging. Seeing unjust people. Married people setting up a tent inside the house in a dream is a sign of marriage soon. A girl’s dream of being inside military tents. This is good news for her marriage to the first groom to propose to her. Interpretation of seeing a tent for a married woman: Seeing a tent cover in a dream for a married woman is a sign of a good husband. If a married woman sees the tent in a dream fixed to the ground, this indicates the stability of married life. A spacious tent in a dream is a sign of the wonderful livelihood that she and her family will have. To dream that you are setting up a tent in a dream for a married woman is an indication of the joy and happiness that surrounds her. Seeing a tent uprooted from a married woman is evidence of the destruction of the house, an unfortunate vision. Interpretation of a dream of cutting scenes in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the husband’s journey. Interpretation of a dream about a tent for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream giving birth in a tent is evidence of the major issue that will be involved. The child in the future. The interpretation of visions of a mystical scene in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that praiseworthy things will happen to the pregnant woman. The dream of a broken tent pole in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the death of the husband. A scene in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of an easy and trouble-free birth And also a boy. Interpretation of a man’s vision of a scene: For a man, a scene is a sign of the travel opportunity that will be available to the viewer. Interpretation of a dream about a scene in a man’s dream indicates the fulfillment of his desires and goals. Interpretation of seeing a man running a stage in a dream indicates a future full of fears and problems. Seeing a man

title: Interpretation of a dream about an earring according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an earring and earrings in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, an earring in a man’s ear, an earring of white gold or silver, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and al-Nibulsi. Others: The neck in a dream is one of the relatively strange dreams that disturbs the dreamer in a state of confusion and anxiety to know the correct and complete interpretation of the dream. The neck is one of the decorative tools in our lives that many women wear. Let us have complete adornment in our public life.. There are also some men who wear the neck in life, and this is not at all popular and has many meanings. The translator Imam Al-Sadiq explained in his interpretations and wrote the interpretation of many meanings and signs for the dreamer if he sees the neck in a dream, we will explain them to you completely. And with all the different details that we see. In our dreams. Interpretation of an earring in a dream. As for a man’s earring, it is an act of listening, and the pleasure of the ear is only appropriate for women, such as singing and playing music. I was born. Whoever sees a woman or a slave with earrings or a veil in her ears, it will become clear to him that there is trade in the area inhabited by hikers, where there are decorated slaves and slaves. The woman and the maid are trade, and the ear in which the earring is placed is the maids and women. The world and its beauty, because the beauty of everything is pearls, and he believes in the Qur’an, religion, a good voice, and perfection in his affairs. However, if he slanders himself, he will have a daughter. If a pregnant woman sees that she will give birth to a boy. Earrings and singing are the same for men and women, and if the earring is of gold, then he is a singer, and if it is of silver, he has memorized half of the Qur’an. On my authority, a man came to Ibn Shirin and said: I saw that there was an earring in one of my ears, and he said to him: How do you sing? He said, “I have a good voice.” Interpretation of the neck in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Losing an earring or earring in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is lost in many decisions. Seeing someone losing an earring in a dream means that the dreamer is suffering from a conflict between him and someone. Seeing someone buying an earring or earring In a dream, it is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a living and success in the near future. Earrings or earrings in a dream for a married woman, is evidence of the good that is coming to her. A married woman whose neck sticks out in a dream is evidence of disagreements between her and her husband in life. That the woman forgets A married woman has her earrings in a dream somewhere or if they are stolen, this is evidence of the need to improve her relationship with those around her. A married woman received an earring or earrings as a gift from her husband in a dream as a sign of great goodness that is passing through her. A neck in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of kindness And many important things in the future. Seeing a pregnant gold earring in a dream is evidence of the birth of a healthy male child. Buying a pregnant silver earring in a dream is evidence of the birth of a woman of very high beauty. Seeing an unmarried woman with a clean shave in a dream is an indication of the approaching Marriage in the near future. When an unmarried woman sees a golden earring in a dream, this is evidence of imminent marriage and engagement. An unmarried woman who sees that she has an earring indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing the sound of a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of this vision depends on detailed knowledge of the details and facts of the vision, just as it depends on knowledge of the social status of the viewer, whether she is married or divorced. As for the woman, she is married, single, pregnant, or divorced, and this is what we will learn in today’s dream website topic. Seeing the sound of a snake in a dream for a son Sirin, the scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes both good and evil, according to the details of the vision. He said that a man who dreams that his wife gives birth to a snake in a dream is a sign that she will give birth to a disabled son. The vision also indicates the approaching stage full of difficulties and problems. As for someone who dreams that a snake is sitting next to him in a dream and he hears its sound and does not harm him, this indicates that there is a person close to him in reality who has unpleasant and hateful feelings towards him. And when someone dreams of being bitten by a snake in a dream, but he quickly gets rid of this pain, this is a sign of enhanced strength. Almighty God, for His constant remembrance of God. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes bad luck and bad news. The meaning of dreaming about the sound of a snake in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a snake in a dream indicates the enemy. An unmarried girl who sees a snake in a dream and hears its voice indicates the presence of a strong force, and for her a cheater is a person who She loves him and wants to marry him, and she must be careful and wait to choose her life partner. The vision also means that there are difficulties and crises that the visionary will go through. When an unmarried woman dreams that a snake has attacked her sanctuary, in the dream there is strong evidence that he is committing disobedience and sins. Seeing the sound of a snake in a dream for a married woman is a vision A snake in a dream for a married woman is a sign of difficulties in marital life. Anyone who sees that she was bitten by a snake in a dream indicates the great suffering she suffers from her mother-in-law or her husband’s sisters. As for whoever was able to escape from the snake in the dream, it symbolizes: overcoming the vision of the family problems she is going through. With her husband. A dream about the sound of a snake in a dream by Sheikh Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said, Hearing the sound of a snake in a dream of a girl who has never been married indicates that she hears sweet words from a young man in her life. The vision may indicate that the fortuneteller is very ill. The meaning of seeing the sound of a snake in a dream for a young man: A young man who Dreaming of the sound of a snake in his dream is a sign that the girl. The person she loves is disreputable and unfit for marriage. And who sees it? Run away from the snake. In the dream, it means that he is strong and able to get out of his crises. Add the dream you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article and we will respond. And we explain it.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a male child according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a male child: Every woman dreams of pregnancy and childbirth from an early age, but what does she see in a dream? A male child. This vision brings her kindness or brings anxiety and sadness. We will learn in detail through this article. Interpretation of a dream about a boy whose son is born by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a male child? It indicates A newborn baby in a dream indicates problems and anxiety, but if the baby is clean and happy, this is an indication that the dreamer will find a prestigious job, and seeing this dream for a young man is evidence of marriage and may indicate a high status that he will gain in his life. The dream in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that her due date is approaching. And that it will be easy, and for a married woman if she has children, this is evidence of her suffering in raising them, and if she does not have children, it is a sign of childbearing. What is the interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s son? Whoever sees in his dream many children, this is evidence of the difficulties that he will face in His life, and if the child cries, this is evidence of a large number of debts and his inability to pay them. Seeing a small child in a dream and then becoming a young man is evidence of the positive change that is occurring in the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees a small child in his room indicates that he has committed sins and disobedience, and the vision is a warning. For him and he must repent and return to God. Interpretation of a dream about a male newborn. The vision carries good meanings for unmarried people because it indicates the nearness of marriage in the case of engagement or it indicates engagement if she is unmarried. It indicates freedom from sin and then God repents for it. The presence of a boy in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates success and the achievement of what she has been striving for for some time. To see a male child, but he is ugly, means that the girl will marry a man with bad morals and she will suffer in her life with him. Interpretation of a dream about a male child for a married woman: seeing a married woman with a child in The dream indicates a female pregnancy, but if she sees a baby girl, this is evidence of a male pregnancy. The presence of a male baby in a married woman’s dream is evidence of instability and many disagreements between her and her husband. Seeing a sick child in a married woman’s dream is a sign of crises and difficulties that her husband will face. Egyptian website. A specialist that includes a team of senior dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Interpretation of a dream about a man born from a pregnant woman. Dream interpretation jurists say that this vision for a pregnant woman is evidence of the earliest date of childbirth, and it also indicates that she will give birth to a woman, and the vision also indicates the Gulf after distress, recovery from diseases, and the end. Of anxiety. If a pregnant woman sees this vision in the last months, it is an indication of the ease of childbirth, and it is also evidence of the safety of the pregnant woman and the safety of her newborn. Seeing a pregnant male child in a dream means that she is exposed to a serious health problem, so she needs to take care of her health and follow up with her doctor. Interpretation of a dream about a child born to a man: Seeing a male child for a man indicates the anxiety that is holding him and may indicate financial crises that he is exposed to. If a man dreams that he has many male children, this is a sign of anxiety and

title: Interpretation of seeing the name Rami in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the name Rami in a dream for a single woman. It indicates the vision. The name Rami in a dream. The dreamer has many good qualities and has high morals. It indicates the dreamer achieving all his dreams and aspirations that he was always trying to achieve. This vision symbolizes the coming of goodness, abundance and blessings in the life of the dreamer. It is a clear sign of... This person will enjoy excellence and success in his family and professional life. It also indicates that this person is on the right path, kind and far from paths full of mistakes that cause problems. This vision shows the end of worries, pressures and all the hardships he was exposed to in his previous life. This means that This person has insight and wisdom in all aspects of his life. Seeing a person named Rami in a dream. If the dreamer sees a person in a dream, whose name is Rami, this indicates that the person who has the vision is characterized by rationality and his ability to distinguish between good and evil. It also indicates the dreamer’s victory over his enemies and getting rid of those who hate him and his hatred. And his envy. This vision also reflects the ability of the person having the vision to overcome problems and overcome all the difficulties and pressures that stand in his way. It symbolizes the fulfillment of the dreams and ambitions of the dreamer and the acquisition of what he wants. Interpretation of the name Mahjoub in a dream indicates seeing Veiled in a dream to cover up and cover up, and for this person to be isolated from people by his news. And everything related to him. It also indicates his high status and high position among the people and his reaching a prominent position. It also symbolizes the person who has a barrier, cover, or large barrier standing between him and the people. It is also a sign that the dreamer enjoys safety, security, tranquility, peace of mind, and complete distance from The eyes of men and their envious looks. It also symbolizes staying away from evil and injustice and protecting the dreamer from harm from all the problems and worries caused by those close to him. The name Rami in a divorced woman’s dream. After the name Rami in a dream is a good and promising vision for this woman. Because it indicates the success and excellence that this woman will achieve in life. Her life. It also indicates getting rid of the worries and pressures that burden her heart with sadness and prevent her from happiness and joy. It is also a sign that God Almighty will compensate her for the past, and provide her with a husband who fears her. This woman symbolizes the enjoyment of good qualities and that she has a strong and calm personality capable of keeping up with her. Its affairs and bear all the obligations assigned to it. Interpretation of names in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing names has many meanings, such as if the dreamer sees in his dream a name among the names attributed to God Almighty, this is good news of victory over enemies. It also indicates the ability to overcome difficulties, avoid pressures and bad things. That the viewer is exposed to in his life. In case you saw the name of the name, this name had a good meaning and did not offend anyone because it shows the pride, honor and dignity that the god enjoyed in his life and gained a high position of great value. If an unmarried girl sees one of the names attributed to God, this means She likes to cover up, and she will receive many blessings from God Almighty. title: Interpretation of a dream about a new bed for senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new bed in a dream: Buying anything new in general gives the soul endless comfort and happiness, renews joy and excitement and also makes the viewer happy, so what if the bed is new in a dream? Dreaming of a new bed has many interpretations that can bring goodness and can bring its opposite, but in general it shows a woman, and in this article we will refer to the interpretations of this dream from all sides, so follow the site. A different interpretation of dreaming of a new bed in a dream. What is the interpretation of dreaming of a new bed in Sleeping on a new mattress in a dream indicates satisfaction with the situation as well as confidence in it. Also, seeing a new bed indicates that the person will take on some new tasks in the coming period. If the bed in the dream is made of straw, this indicates that the dreamer faces many problems, pressures, and failures. Perhaps the interpretation of a dream about a new bed in a dream is a sign of bliss, comfort and prosperity. If the dreamer is sleeping in the bed, and it is not a deep sleep, then this indicates peace of mind. This dream could be an indication of distance from religion and insufficiency of the right of God Almighty, and that the dreamer is negligent in his affairs and is not responsible for his affairs. Anything. Also, this vision may indicate the dreamer’s need for money. Whoever tore the bed in his dream, this indicates that there is an untrustworthy person around the fortuneteller who stabs him in the back. If the mattress is hung in a high place, this indicates a high, noble, and great position. Regarding the interpretation of a dream about a new bed In a dream, the patient indicates the continuation of his illness or death, and God knows best. If the dreamer is in a bed that he does not know, then this is a sign that he has attained great authority. Placing the new mattress under the bed indicates the presence of turmoil. Anyone who sees himself carrying a mattress in a dream indicates his journey and departure. A cotton or wool mattress suggests a wealthy woman. If he The dreamer will achieve a certain thing in his life, so seeing a bed is a sign of his inability to achieve it. Interpretation of a dream about a new bed in a dream for a man: Seeing a new mattress in a man’s dream means his relationship with a good new wife, especially if he bought this mattress during his sleep. Whoever dreams of selling his bed, this means that he He will divorce his wife, but if his wife gets sick, this indicates her death, and God knows best. If the bed is torn in a man’s dream, he will be associated with a bad and low-religious woman. If a man sleeps in the bed in his dream, this indicates his indifference to his religion. If the bed is comfortable in a dream, this is a sign of reaching Excellent situation: If he sees a bed full of black insects, this indicates his lack of religion, his distance from God, and his committing his sins. Also, buying a new mattress in a man’s dream indicates the good and huge nutrition that he will receive. If a man is imprisoned, this is good news for him that he will gain his freedom soon. If the man sees himself sleeping on a bed White, then this indicates that his wife is of a moral and religious nature. If one dreams that he is getting out of bed, it means that he is sick or suffering from a big problem. If a man folds his bed in a dream, it means that he will travel soon or that something bad will happen to him. If he sees a roaming animal

title: Interpretation of seeing a white flag in a dream for a man

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a flag in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The national flag in a dream symbolizes high status, stability, work and success. The flag in a dream symbolizes elevation, the future and the will. Whoever saw his country’s flag in a dream, raised and beaten, this is a sign of skill and strength. Whoever dreams that he has absorbed knowledge indicates success, overcoming difficulties and transformation. From one situation to another. If a woman sees the national flag in a dream, this indicates her happiness and evidence of her success in life. If a pregnant woman sees a flag or a flag in a dream, this means that she will give birth to a child with whom she will have a relationship in the future. An unmarried girl in her dream that her country’s flag is flying means that It indicates the arrival of the groom to her engagement. A flag in a dream indicates a state of psychological chaos and economic crises. If anyone sees this flag burned in a dream, this indicates the loss of a child or money. Interpretation of seeing a flag in a dream according to Nabulsi. Science. In a dream, he is a man of knowledge and generous ascetics follow him. Red flags indicate war. Individuals indicate the appearance of thousands and epidemics, experts indicate good travel, white flags indicate rain, and black flags indicate drought. The one who is confused about gifts, and this may be a person, an idea, victory or defeat. Whoever sees the flag of his country in a dream indicates self-harmony and in his environment he has reached prosperity and may indicate patriotic feelings. Regarding seeing the flag of the country of others in a dream, this indicates the worries of the world and the fears of the dreamer. For a girl, if she sees the flag of another country in a dream, this may indicate a deterioration in the relationship between her and the person she is related to, and the same thing. Seeing the flag moving in a dream indicates the possibility of searching for comfort or that you are in a matter that requires comfort. Interpretation of seeing a country’s flag in a dream: If You dreamed of the flag of your country, this portends victory, if your country is at war and prosperity in a state of peace. If a woman sees a flag, it means that she will fall into a soldier’s trap. If a woman sees foreign flags, it means severing ties and breaking covenants between countries and friends. If someone sees that he has received a signal from... The flag, it means that you need to take care of your health and reputation. If one sees his flag covered with bombs, it symbolizes wars and the loss of military honor. Everything that the person saw is his country’s flag floating in a clear sky, and this indicates victory over foreign enemies. Interpretation of seeing a flag in a dream for a woman. A woman who sees science in a dream is evidence of The fulfillment of her desires and the happiness that dominates her. A pregnant woman who sees her country’s flag waving indicates that she will give birth to a high-class male. Seeing a free girl. When her country’s flag is waving in a dream, this indicates a connection with a person of high status. Whoever sees her country’s flag in her dream is tall and single, this indicates her engagement. And God knows best: Seeing a white flag in a dream for a man if he sees bitterness
